summary: Fixed TypeError in ProfileTab.js where page.split() was called on undefined. Applied fix by adding optional chaining (page?.split) to all 4 occurrences. React app restarted. User should refresh browser to see changes. Remaining console errors (Token missing, Firebase warnings) are expected/non-critical and will resolve after login.
